`eslint-plugin-antonin`
===================

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

# Installation

```sh
$ npm install eslint eslint-plugin-antonin
```

# Configuration


```json
  "plugins": [
    "antonin",
  ],
  "rules": {
    "antonin/no-tilde-import": "error",
  }
```
